definitions: a tall plant of the rose family (Rosaceae) with clusters of sweet-smelling flowers.

notes.text: Spiraeae latifola of North American meadows and roadsides, with white or pale pink flowers
Filipendula ulmaria, native to Eurasia and naturalized in North America, with creamy white flowers and favoring damp meadows

shortDefinitions: tall Eurasian plant of rose family, with heads of creamy-white sweet-smelling flowers
